Nabo provides real estate management services that can assist you in finding your next rental property or leasing your current property for top-dollar. Their management services are tailored to your specific needs for tenant placement or management services, with plans available for all types of residential and commercial property. Their tenant placement services aim to fill your vacancy ASAP thanks to extensive marketing efforts and high-quality listings aimed at your target demographic. They’ll also screen any applicant for criminal, rental, and employment history to ensure that your tenant pays rent reliably and causes fewer expensive problems during the lease term. Daily management with Nabo takes care of all tenant and property responsibilities, including communication, rent collection, maintenance, lease management, and accounting so that you can sit back and relax.

name: Rent Athens LLC
address: 247 E Washington St, Suite 102, Athens, GA 30601
description: Rent Athens offers residential and commercial property management services to clients throughout the Greater Athens area. Rent Athens works to make it easy to get started earning passive rental income, handling all of the day-to-day operations of managing your property so you can sit back and enjoy life. Their services start with a consultation to determine your needs, identify ways to achieve your goals within your budget, and prepare your property to be leased. In addition, they will perform a complimentary rental analysis to accurately price your property before it goes on the rental market. As part of their leasing services, they handle marketing your vacancy, conducting showings, screening prospective tenants thoroughly, drafting the lease in compliance with Georgia Landlord-Tenant laws, and collecting the security deposit. During tenancy, Rent Athens coordinates maintenance and inspections, answers all tenant communication, collects the rent, enforces the lease, processes lease renewals and evictions, and provides monthly and year-end accounting, with financial statements and tax documents available on-demand through the 24/7 owner portal.

name: Carriage House Realty Inc.
address: 855 Gaines School Road Suite N Athens, GA 30605
description: Carriage House Realty has more than 40 years of experience offering comprehensive real estate management services to the Greater Athens area. Carriage House offers support for all aspects of real estate management, including real estate, property management, and HOA management, so that they can be your one-stop-shop for all of your investment needs. Their real estate team can help you to find a new investment property by utilizing their market knowledge to evaluate rental potential so that you can budget effectively. They also offer free initial consultations for your rental to help you discover your earning potential and offer suggestions to increase that figure. Carriage House’s leasing services take care of creating a listing, marketing it throughout the MLS and listing sites, showing it to applicants, screening potential tenants, negotiating leases, and handling security deposits in accordance with Georgia Landlord-Tenant law. Their leasing services, which are free until you have a tenant in place, include all tenant-facing and property needs so that you can sit back and relax. This includes rent collection & disbursement, bill payment, maintenance coordination, landscaping & upkeep, lease renewals, evictions, and bookkeeping to help you stay profitable.

name: AGA Properties
description: AGA Properties is a full-service brokerage and property management firm serving residential clients throughout the Athens area. To get you started, their licensed real estate agents will conduct a rental market analysis to identify unique investment opportunities and provide representation and guidance throughout the purchase process, with additional budgeting and consultation services available to ensure a seamless rental transition. As part of their leasing services, they’ll take care of all marketing, showings, screenings, security deposit deposition, and preparing and executing the lease agreement in accordance with local, state, and federal laws. During tenancy, AGA provides online portals for both tenants and owners for anytime communication. Tenants can also use their provided portal for regular and emergency maintenance requests and rent collection, while owners can view financial statements, tax reports, property expenses, and more.

name: Cobblestone Property Management Group
address: 494 Baxter Street, Suite A Athens, GA 30604
description: Cobblestone Property Management Group offers residential property management to Athens and the surrounding areas. Their services span all steps of the leasing process, including tenant placement, daily management, and turnover plus financial services that keep you informed at all times. If you need a tenant for your vacancy, they market your listing, show the property, screen applicants, and negotiate the lease so that you can get started with a high-quality tenant. Monthly financial summaries, reports on maintenance or inspections, and detailed records are also kept for you in the owner portal which can be accessed at any time.

name: Landmark Properties
description: Landmark Properties is a complete real estate brokerage, property management, and HOA management company servicing Athens and the surrounding areas. For HOAs, Landmark Properties works to improve the efficiency of your operations and the quality standard maintained throughout your community while lessening the burden of your Board. They can help you with any aspect of association management, including establishing a Board or creating guidelines for a new community, coordinating & attending meetings, recordkeeping, budgeting & bookkeeping, staffing, vendor negotiations, landscaping, common area upkeep, dues collection, covenant enforcement, owner support, and much more.

name: Athena Management

name: RealtyWerx Property Management

name: Best Property Managers in Nearby Cities
Neal Fineman Property Management
description: Neal Fineman Property Management offers residential property management to property owners throughout Oahu. Their daily management takes care of collecting the rent, answering maintenance requests, providing 24/7 emergency support, renewing leases, overseeing evictions (with protection from lost rent), and financial reporting so that you can keep track of your profitability.
management_fee: 0 – 10% of monthly rent depending on the service plan
tenant_placement_fee: 50 – 100% of one month’s rent depending on the service plan
miscellaneous_fees: $250 move-out inspection fee, $500 professional photo fee, $750 eviction fee

management_fee: 15% of the first month’s rent, then 10% of monthly rent for each month for tenancies of 3+ months, or 15% of monthly rent for tenancies under 3 months

Red Door Company aims to simplify the rental property process for you by assisting with every step to ensure you’re maximizing your profitability while minimizing your time investment. Their real estate division provides market insight and cash flow analysis for potential investment properties to help you make the best decision possible and can also assist with acquiring the property in a timely fashion so that you can get to the rental market and begin earning income sooner. Red Door’s full-service management takes your vacant property and fills it with a high-quality tenant who passes their rigorous screening process to ensure your property is taken care of and your cash flow remains consistent before assuming the role of the landlord during the lease term to provide all daily management required to generate passive income for you. This includes rent collection, property bill payment, inspections, maintenance, renewals, evictions, and reporting.
tenant_placement_fee: 50% of one month’s rent

name: Apple Realty
description: Apple Realty has nearly 40 years of experience providing brokerage and property management services for residential properties throughout Durham and the surrounding areas. Apple Realty handles real estate and property management for all kinds of residential investment properties, working with investors to buy new properties and existing property owners to begin generating rental income. They can take care of everything necessary to find, acquire, and prepare a new rental property for you to add to your portfolio thanks to market insight and brokerage services backed by nearly 40 years of Durham market experience. For existing properties, they’ll make recommendations for improvements that increase your earning potential and help transition the property to the rental market for a seamless tenant placement process. Apple Realty’s tenant placement takes care of creating & advertising a listing for your vacancy, shows the property, screens applicants for a variety of background information, and drafts a custom lease to ensure you’re protected. During the lease, all day-to-day management is taken care of so that you can be entirely hands-off without losing out on the rental income they generate through rent collection, maintenance, and lease management.
tenant_placement_fee: 100% of one month’s rent

description: Tidewater Property Management has over 30 years of experience providing full-service management and real estate services to owners, investors, and HOA Boards. Tidewater PM can do it all. name: American Heritage Property Management

name: Best Property Managers in Nearby Cities
Rentwell Philadelphia
address: 301 E Baltimore Ave, Clifton Heights, PA 19018
description: Rentwell Philadelphia offers residential-only property management services to property owners and investors in the Greater Philadelphia area. management_fee: 6 – 10% or $175 – $195 depending on plan and rental rate
tenant_placement_fee: 50 – 100% of one month’s rent depending on plan and rent value
miscellaneous_fees: $55 inspections with standard plan, $250 – $500 set-up fee depending on plan

Darwin acts as your “boots on the ground”, providing you with active management of your property that ensures it is being taken care of whether you’re in the same city or another state. They offer a satisfaction guarantee for all their services and no upfront fees, with tenant placement service backed by a 6-month guarantee on selected tenants which means you can be confident in the value of your placement fee. They offer a free rental analysis to help price your property and get it prepared for showings plus diligent screening services that make it unlikely that their lease breakage guarantee needs to be enacted. Darwin also takes care of the daily management of your property from answering maintenance calls to collecting rent and paying property bills to providing 24/7 emergency support for both you and your tenant. Financial services in the form of monthly account summaries are included with your management plan, which are accessible 24/7 through the owner portal where you’ll also find maintenance and inspection reports.
tenant_placement_fee: 125-150% of the first month’s rent

Their management services include all tenant-facing duties and communication, including rent collection, maintenance, and emergency support 24/7.
tenant_placement_fee: 70% of one month’s rent for tenant placement only

name: West Property Management

description: North Pacific Properties provides comprehensive management solutions to residential clients throughout Seattle and the surrounding areas. North Pacific works with single- and multi-family property owners to eliminate the hassles of property management, minimize your expenses, and help you to maximize your ROI. Their services begin with a rental analysis to outline your expected income, make recommendations on renovations, and get the property rent-ready. As part of their leasing services, they will market your property online and offline for maximum exposure, conduct showings, screen prospective tenants for credit, criminal, and rental history, prepare and execute the lease agreement in compliance with Washington Landlord-Tenant laws, collect the security deposit, and handle move-in procedures. North Pacific’s daily management services handle tenant communication, rent collection, preventative and emergency maintenance, bi-annual inspections, lease enforcement and renewals, evictions, and monthly and year-end financial reporting.
management_fee: 10%, but a discount may be available for multiple or high-end properties
tenant_placement_fee: 100% of one month’s rent

name: Avenue One LLC
address: 2212 Queen Anne Ave. N. #724, Seattle, WA 98109
description: Avenue One focuses exclusively on residential property management for landlords and property owners throughout the Greater Seattle area. Avenue One prides themselves on over a century of combined management experience, focusing their services on protecting your investment to provide you peace of mind. Financial reporting services are also available through the online owner portal, where you can view monthly expense reports and year-end tax statements on demand.
tenant_placement_fee: 1 month’s rent

name: Davis Property Management
description: Davis PM is a Seattle property management company offering services for residential, commercial, and mixed-use industrial properties throughout the Greater Puget Sound area. MPI Property Management handles all aspects of property management, offering full-service management solutions that are custom-tailored to meet your needs. To help you get started earning, they provide a free rental analysis using comparable local properties and their knowledge of current market conditions to identify the right price point for your property. Once your property is ready to be leased, they will advertise your vacancy, conduct showings six days a week with licensed agents, screen prospective tenants thoroughly to ensure only qualified, reliable tenants are placed, and prepare and execute the lease in compliance with Wisconsin Landlord-Tenant laws. Daily management with MPI includes maintenance and inspections, rent collection and disbursement, monthly accounting, tenant communication, lease renewals, and evictions as needed.

Leasing services offered include marketing and advertising the property across their exclusive network, showing it to potential tenants, screening applicants for credit, criminal, and rental history, and drafting the lease in compliance with local and state laws. During the lease term, Residential Renters also handles collecting the rent, coordinating maintenance, conducting inspections, communicating with tenants, processing lease renewals and evictions, and more.
tenant_placement_fee: 1 month’s rent
